entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: The main character of the story, mentioned as having a plan to spy on Malfoy.

entities.name: dobby
entities.description: A house-elf who is concerned about Harry's plan and tries to dissuade him.

entities.name: malfoy
entities.description: A person mentioned as having previously infiltrated the Headquarters, and who needs the Room to become the DA's Headquarters.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: A person who is concerned about Harry's plan and tries to dissuade him.

entities.name: kreacher
entities.description: A house-elf who is mentioned as having done well in some unspecified way.

relationships.description: Harry Potter has a plan to spy on Malfoy.
Malfoy uses the Room as his Headquarters.
Harry Potter does not know what happens to the Room when Malfoy is inside.
Hermione praises Kreacher for doing well.
